marklogic.body: The community organizer, his economic team with the help of Pelosi, Frank, Reid, Biden,Rangel and others have given the American tax payers what he promised,Change you can believe in. It has been 1058 days and the Democrat senate has not passed a budget. Our nation is $16.4 trillion in debt and we now borrow .42 cents on every dollar. I they all came down with a bad case of Diarrhea and it drew their a--ho--- up around their necks and chocked them to death our nation would be much better Off.
